newsitem.title: FRANCE: French boy kills schoolmate in shooting accident.
newsitem.headline: French boy kills schoolmate in shooting accident.

text.p: France's Education Minister decreed a two-hour pause for debate at schools across the country after a teenage boy shot dead a fellow pupil, apparently by accident, outside a school on Tuesday.
Investigators said Julien, 15, was shot dead outside a school in Montereau outside Paris when a pupil took a gun out of his satchel to show his friends. The bullet hit Julien in the heart.
The weapon belonged to the pupil's father, a retired policeman.
Education Minister Francois Bayrou said lessons at schools across France would stop for two hours on Friday to allow pupils and teachers to discuss violence in schools.
"I want teachers, schoolparents and children to talk about what must be done to defuse the climate of violence plaguing modern societies," Bayrou said.
